lines.text: I think... the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> might be behind this one.
With that Living Memory spell! He could cast an illusion of the hole!
Eh? How would that work? Ain't those blue and see-through?
Uh, well, he cast it different. So that it'd look solid.
Then he cast it so it'd look like a hole! Quit nitpicking!
Puttin' aside whether the spell can actually be tweaked to look different like that...
The more important limitation is that it's gotta be a memory of his.
He can't cast an illusion of a hole in the <c=#FF0000>Go Wizard</c> unless he really did have a hole in 'im at some point.
